ing: 2 (1.2 ounce) packages dry brown gravy mix
n: Slow Cooker Beef Stew with Parsnip
des: "This beef stew always has people asking for the recipe. It is thick and heavy on the onion, as that is what my family likes. As I am lazy, I do not brown the beef before sticking in the slow cooker."
ins:
Mix ground beef, carrots, onions, parsnip, sweet potato, water, brown gravy mix. onion gravy mix, beef bouillon, salt, pepper, oregano, basil, and thyme in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low for 8 hours.
